companyDescription: 7-Eleven Malaysia Holdings Berhad (SEM) is an investment holding company listed on the Main Market of Bursa Malaysia Securities Berhad since 2014. Through its major subsidiary, 7-Eleven Malaysia Sdn. Bhd. (7-Eleven Malaysia), SEM owns and operates 7-Eleven stores in Malaysia.  7-Eleven Malaysia is the pioneer and largest 24-hours standalone convenience store operator in Malaysia.

topShareholders.shareholderName: Tan Sri Dato’ Seri Vincent Tan Chee Yioun
